headline: Co-Founder at Deskimo | ex Head of Asia at Rocket Internet | CEO & Founder of Gobee.bike | CSO & Co-Founder of HotelQuickly | MD of Foodpanda
summary:
Co-founded Deskimo in 2021, incubated by Y-Combinator. Deskimo provides on-demand access to work desks and meeting rooms in Singapore, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Malaysia and the UAE. Deskimo also provides a SaaS platform for hybrid workplace management.

Managed Asia-Pacific for Rocket Internet. Incubated 12 companies including Spenmo, Tinvio, Ofload, Flash Coffee, among others.

CEO & Co-Founder of Gobee.bike, the leading station-less bike sharing operator outside China.

Co-founded HotelQuickly, Asia's largest last-minute hotel booking app.

Started-up and developed foodpanda Vietnam (www.foodpanda.vn), Vietnam's #1 online food ordering platform, part of foodpanda.com and Rocket Internet.

Lived in Paris, Toronto, Shanghai, Singapore, Ho Chi Minh City and Hong Kong, traveled to over 100 countries around the world.

Fluent in French, English, Mandarin Chinese and Spanish, conversant in Bahasa Indonesia, Cantonese, Hebrew.

Always looking for new opportunities to develop and apply my skills while using my international experience after living on 3 continents and constantly traveling around the world.

Specialties: -International business start-up and development
-E-Commerce, online, mobile sales and marketing strategies

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description:
Deskimo provides on-demand access to work desks and meeting rooms in professionally managed workspaces across Singapore, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Malaysia and the UAE. Companies use Deskimo to enable their hybrid workforce to stay productive when they work from outside the office.

Y Combinator invested into Deskimo in Spring 2021 and we are part of the S21 batch.

Download the Deskimo app to join the hybrid work revolution.

experiences.title: Managing Director Asia
experiences.description:
Looking after Rocket Internet for Asia-Pacific.

Rocket Internet incubates, builds and operationally develops internet-based business models.

Rocket Internet has incubated global market leaders such as Lazada, Foodpanda, Zalora, Daraz, Zalando, Jumia.

It provides operational support to its companies and helps them scale internationally. Besides, it strategically invests in complementary internet and technology companies globally to build out its network. Rocket Internet's companies are active in a large number of countries around the world. Rocket Internet is listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange (RKET).

New APAC companies incubated:
Tinvio - www.tinvio.com
Spenmo -  www.spenmo.com
Bluenest - www.bluenest.sg
Ofload - www.ofload.com.au
Flash Coffee - www.flash-coffee.com
Vitable - www.vitable.com.au
Wagetap - www.wagetap.com

experiences.title: Global Venture Development Manager - Asia
experiences.description:
Rocket Internet is the world's largest internet incubator, operating over 110 companies in 50+ countries, publicly listed in Frankfurt (RKET).

Rocket's mission is to become the world’s largest Internet platform outside of the United States and China. Rocket identifies and builds proven Internet business models and transfers them to new, underserved or untapped markets where it seeks to scale them into market leading online companies. Rocket started in 2007 and now has more than 30,000 employees across its network of companies, which are active in more than 110 countries across six continents.

In charge of the start-up and accelerated development of new internet ventures in Asia.
experiences.location: Singapore, Hong Kong, Ho Chi Minh

experiences.title: CEO & Co-Founder
experiences.description:
-Started-up and built-up one of the world’s largest and fastest-growing bike-sharing platforms
-Raised US$13.5m of equity financing from prominent international investors, including Alibaba Group
-Built-up and led a team of 150+ employees across 9 cities in Asia and Europe
-Served hundreds of thousands of customers with millions of rides and 38k shared bicycles

https://www.cnbc.com/video/2017/08/09/the-bike-sharing-craze-has-now-hit-the-shores-of-hong-kong.html
https://techcrunch.com/2017/08/03/hong-kongs-gobee-raises-9m/

experiences.title: Mentor
experiences.description: Providing mentorship and feedback to early-stage start-ups in Hong Kong.

experiences.title: CSO & Co-Founder
experiences.description:
Looking after hotel contracting and supply management globally for the company. Leading the sales and account management department in 8 countries

HotelQuickly is the leading last-minute hotel booking mobile application in APAC, with over 2.5m downloads. With the most exclusive hotels in the region on offer, our users enjoy the fastest and most convenient way to book the most attractive last minute hotel room.

For hotels, we provide a solution to fill unsold rooms that would otherwise remain empty and incur costs.

HotelQuickly is currently active in 16 countries in APAC with over 15,000 partner hotels. The company has over 60 employees and USD 8.5m in funding.

experiences.title: Start-up Mentor at Google Empowering Young Entrepreneurs Program (EYE Program)
experiences.description: Mentoring young start-ups in Hong Kong.

experiences.title: Managing Director (Vietnam)
experiences.description:
Vietnam's #1 online food ordering platform - www.foodpanda.vn
Part of Foodpanda.com, the world's largest online food ordering platform, backed up by Rocket Internet and Goldman Sachs with $300m+ in funding.

• Set-up, launched and managed Vietnam’s #1 online food ordering platform in Vietnamese and English
• Recruited, trained and managed 27 sales, marketing, call center, operations, and accounting staff.
• Negotiated and secured agreements with partner restaurants across Vietnam.
• Wrote and submitted weekly margin, operations, marketing and results reports to the company’s Singapore HQ.
• Developed the business strategy by determining potential partners using income and demographic market analysis.
• Supervised the daily update of the website content with restaurant menus, vendors, and discounts.
• Supervised the marketing team, developed and implemented SEM, Google Display Network, PR campaigns, online affiliates and print ads.
• Created and secured placement of in-store promotional materials in coordination with vendors.
• Prepared and tracked monthly budgets.
• Managed the company service expansion into Hanoi by hiring staff, setting monthly sales targets, signing new restaurants, and implementing local marketing initiatives.

education.school: University of Toronto - Rotman School of Management
education.activities_and_societies: University of Toronto International Students' Union (UTISU)

education.field_of_study: Finance, Economics, Marketing in Asia, Chinese

education.degree_name: French Scientific Baccalaureate (Baccalauréat S with distinction)
